menu: Roti Kulche Te Naan Di Tokri
Makkai Aalu Te Wadiyan Wale Chawal
Palak Dal Da Shorba A healthy broth of spinach & lentils flavoured with dry roasted cumin seeds
Bhindi Naintara Tender lady fingers, halved & marinated in a special blend of tangy masalas, dry roasted gram flour with lime juice. A crispy delicacy.
Dandi Kabab A blend of select vegetables & corn kernels blended into mashed potatoes flavoured with fresh herbs enveloped in whole corn flour & shallow fried, served on wooden skewers
Khaas Bhunne Bhutte Whole corn par grilled in the tandoor, shaved off its cob & tossed in the pan with tangy masalas & fresh herbs
Khatte Khumb Chat Patte Garden fresh mushrooms sauteed with bell peppers & mango powder & chat masala pan roasted
Multani Makhmalli Paneer Tikka Melt in the mouth soft paneer & cheese tikkas, grilled in the tandoor. A treat for TINY TOTS
Palak Paneer Di Tikki White seasame crusted cakes of spinach & paneer blended with mashed potatoes & fresh herbs, pan grilled
Pudina Chilly Paneer Batons of paneer tossed in the pan with green chilly & mint paste topped with green capsicum rings, A spicy treat
Railway Gobi Fresh florets of tender cauliflowers marinated in a spicy concoction of red chilly flakes & yoghurt tossed in the pan
Rani Roopam Di Phulkari (Veg Platter) The Chef's royal choice of an array of vegetarian kababs on a queen sized platter
Subz Palak Sheekh An unuasual combo garden fresh veggies, spinach & crushed roasted peanuts skewered & grilled in the tandoor
Tandoori Khumb Te Bhutte Garden fresh mushrooms & tender baby corn mildly spiced & grilled in the tandoor
Tiranga Mirch Te Broccoli Te Baby Bhutta Red, yellow & green bell peppers tossed with florets of broccoli & baby corn in mustard powder & mild spices in the pan
Adraki Mutter Paneer Home style paneer & peas cooked in brown gravy & flavoured with ginger
Aloo Gobi Mutter Florets of cauliflower & fresh green peas & strips of green chilliues sauteed in minimalistic gravy of tomatoes
Amritsari Wadi Aloo Masaledar Sun dried spicy lentil cup cakes & cubed potatoes cooked in delicious thin gravy. True to tradition these wadis are a nutritious power house
Arbi Masala Me The favourite vegetbale of Punjab, collocassia cooked in a blend of home ground masalas
Baigan Bhartha Large brinjals burnt over embers of charcoal into a squishy mass & blended with a tangy mix of ripe red tomatoes & masalas. Sure to lend a tangy twist
Bharwan Karele Bitter gourd stuffed with masalas, fried & sauteed with diced tomatoes & chopped onions
Bhindi Masala Tender lady fingers tossed with onions and tomatoes, mildly spiced
Dal Makhani An all the time favourite. Black lentils slow cooked obernight & enriched with hone churned butter, mildly tempered with aromatic spices
Dal Palak A nutritious blend of garden fresh spinach & yellow lentils tempered with a dash of cumin & chopped garlic. Made Daai ma's way
Dhingri Mutter Buttons mushrooms cooked with fresh peas, herbs & spices
Dum Aloo Baby potatoes in a delicious brown gravy dum cooked
Jeera Dal Tadka A light yellow lentil dal tempered with roasted cumin
Kadi Pakodi Fried gram flour dumplings cooked in a traditional sour yoghurt & gram flour gravy
Kaju Makhanna Te Paneer Exotic seeds of the beautiful lotus flower roasted & batons of paneer simmered in creamy brown gravy & tempered with aromatic spices
Makkai Khumb Te Palak Tender kernels of corn along with garden fresh mushrooms simmered in a sea of garden fresh spinach
Makkai Paneer Bhurji Tender kernels of corn & crushed paneer cooked with ripe rded tomatoes & mildly spiced
Makkai Simla Mirch Paneer Tender kernels of corn, green bell peppers & paneer cooked in mildly spiced gravy
Malai Kofta Harra Pyaaz Spiced dumplings of mixed vegetables simmered in a rich cashew gravy & a hint of cream. Garnished with fresh spring onions
Masale Wale Jheenge Prawns cooked in home style punjabi gravy.
Memsaab Di Ishtew A variety of exotic english vegetables cooked in a creamy cashew gravy, delicately flavoured with mild spices
Methi Aloo The humble potato diced & tossed up with the magical herb fenugreek, an excellent yet simple dish
Miloree Spicy Subz An eclectic array of vegetables simmered in a bed of garden fresh pureed spinach & amply spiced up to tickle the palate
Naulakha Subz Kalonji Select mix of vegetables slow cooked in mild spices & flavoured with roasted onion seeds
Paneer Tikka Masala Batons of paneer char grilled in tandoori masalas served in a delightful tomato based gravy
Pindi Chole An old time village favourite, Kabuli channa or chick peas soaked overnight & basted in a tangy tomato & onion based semi dry gravy flavoured with mango powder.
Punj Dal da Mela A tribute to the famous rivers of Punjab. An assorted blend of 5 lentils conjured up to a true deghi delight
Punjabi Macchi Kadi Prime cuts of seer fish in delicious home-style gravy.
Rajma Ma's special, traditionally prepared in the Punjabi household on Sundays. Kidney beans slow cooked & blended with a saute of tomatoes & onios. Goes very well with steamed rice
Rara Paneer Batons of cumin seasoned paneer cooked in a rich tomato & crushed paneer gravy
Subz Keema Masala Mince of assorted vegetables & crushed paneer in a semi dry onion based gravy
Veg Amritsari Mixed vegetables in a spicy onion based gravy
Sarson Da Saag Makkai Di Roti (two whole corn rotis served with a truly yummy concoction of mustard leaves, spinach and radish, accomparied by home churned butter and jaggery a robust meal in itself)
Chil Mil Subz A rare combination of chick peas, rajma and paneer in onion based gravy.
Paneer Tiranga An Englishman’s favourite! Batons of paneer enrobed in rich creamy cashew gravy enriched with green yellow & red bell peppers.
Murg Shorba A thin spicy soup. Steamed baby balls of minced chicken flavoured with the freshness of mint
Adraki Chaamp Masala - Mutton Tender mutton chops cooked with exotic fresh herbs with an extra touch of ginger in a thin succulent gravy
Ande Di Subji Specially created to provide a hearty dish for the eggitarian. Fried hard boiled eggs halved & served in mouth watering gravy.
Bhatinde Da Kukkad Juicy chunks of tender chicken cooked in a tangy home style thick gravy enriched with ripe red tomatoes. Subtly spiced
Chandigarh Chicken Cake Curry Generously spiced minced chicken cupcakes in a onion based rich brown gravy
Dal Gosht Tender cuts of mutton cooked in yellow lentils & tempered with cumin seeds. A must for building the muscle mass
Kajuwala Kukkad Kadi Chunks of tender chicken simmered in a rich cashew gravy mildly spiced
Keema And Di Bhurji This is a Punjabi fusion of the simple egg bhurji & delectable mutton minced gravy. Goes very well with all Roti Kulcha Te Naan
Keema Kaleji Te Ubley Ande True hardcore lovers of mutton liver will love this. Cubed mutton liver cooked in a rich gravy of minced mutton topped with hard boiled eggs
Kukkad Tikka Masala Char grilled tender chicken tikkas served in a tomato based mildly spiced gravy. This delicacy has become the national dish of the UK
Lahori Kukkad. An old time favourite of lahore, juicy cuts of chicken served in rich aromatic brown gravy, slow cooked in the old fashioned way
Machchi Tikka Masala Boneless chunks of seer fish pickled & fired in tandoor, in rich tomato gravy
Makkhan Murg What can one describe this true price of Punjab. Simply put it's the internationally acclaimed Butter Chicken
Meat Di Feast A delicious recipe of tender juicy cuts of mutton slow cooked in a rich onion yoghurt & tomato, enriched with steamed spicy mutton koftas swimming in mouth watering minced mutton gravy
Murg Amritsari Chunks of tender chicken in a spicy onion based gravy
murgh Bharta Juliennes of tender chicken in a rich aromatic cashew gravy garnished with graded boiled eggs. A royal treat from the past.
Mutton Rogan Josh An all time favourite of hardcore meat lovers. Juicy chunks from tender leg of mutton slow cooked in an onion based rich gravy enriched with aromatic spices
Omelette Curry Masala This is true Indo French fusion. Masala omlette cut into strips & served in home style Punjabi gravy
Rara Murg Chunks of tender chicken in a spicy onion based gravy.
Amritsari Ajwani Fish Prime fillet of seer fish marinated in a mix of carom seeds, dry roasted gram flour & yoghurt pan fried.

Chatpate Jheenge Prawns in a spicy concoction of tomato, onion & spices grilled on tawa

Kalmi Kabab Drum sticks of chicken coated with crushed cashew nuts, egg white & mildl
Keema Omelette A pancake of rich minced mutton gravy blended with beaten eggs spiced up with freshly ground pepper corns. Easily Keema Parathe da BAAP.
Maharaja Ranjeet Singh Ji Di Chaahat (Non Veg Platter) The chef presents the royal choice of an array of non vegetarian kababs on a king sized platter
Malai Cream Kabab y spiced. Char grilled in the tandoor
Meat Pepper Chaamp A unique tawa kabab of upturned curried mutton chops stir fried with a generous sprinkling of freshly crushed pepper
Murg Galcuti Kabab Succulent juicy chicken tikkas. Spiked generously with freshly crushed pepper corns. Tests the palate to the hilt
Murg Tikke Succulent thighs of chicken, deboned & marinated in hung curd with select spices, char grilled in the tandoor

Pudina Chilly Chicken Juicy tender chickentossed in the pan with green chilly & mint p[aste topped with green capsicum rings & freshly ground mustard seeds & pepper corns, a spicy treat

Pasta Al Bakunin (Fresh mushrooms, garlic, parsley and capers in a red wine and tomato sauce)

Pasta Al Forno (Baked In The Oven) (Creamy bechemelle sauce, mushrooms, mozzarella and fresh tomato sauce)
Pasta Al Gorgonzola (Serves 1) Pasta in blue cheese, butter, cooking cream, parsley.
Pasta Ala Alfredo (Creamy cheese sauce with garlic, mushroom, soya mince, served with parmesan cheese)
Pasta Ala Salmone (Traditional italian tomato sauce, pesto, fresh cream with onion, capsicum, mushroom, olives & parsley)
Pasta Alla Ricotta (Pasta served with ricotta cheese, tomato sauce and Italian herbs)
Pasta Barbaresca (Creamy tomato sauce with fresh broccoli, tomatoes, garlic, parsley, sun-dried tomatoes, tempeh, parmesan cheese and chilly pepper)
Pasta Del Barone (A classic noble sauce with bechamel, tomato sauce, red chilly and parmesan cheese)
Pasta Del Fattore (Tomato, onion, garlic, capsicum, capers, olives, parsley, mushrooms and olive oil)
Pasta Della Nonna Adelina (Pasta cooked with a creamy red-yellow capsicum paste and flavoured with vodka)
Pasta Don Vito (Fresh cream sauce with sun-dried tomatoes, garlic, freshly chopped tomatoes, gorgonzola cheese and fresh broccoli)
Pasta Donatella (Creamy sauce with freshly chopped tomatoes, capers, black olives, gouda cheese, gorgonzola cheese and chili)
Pasta Gambaza (Cream sauce with mushroom, asparigus, garlic sprinkled with chilly and parmesan cheese)
Pasta Paprika (Cream sauce with onion, garlic, white wine, tabasco, broccoli)
Pasta Sole Di Sicilia (A preparation of fresh tomatoes, mozzarella, basil, garlic, capers, olives, sun-dried tomatoes and parmesan cheese)
Primavera (Red-yellow capsicum, olives, capers, sun-dried tomatoes, garlic, broccoli, zucchini and olive oil)
Pummorola (Serves 1) Fresh tomato sauce, fresh basil.
Puttanesca (Traditional Italian spicy tomato sauce with olives, capers and basil)
Risotto 4 Formaggi (Spicial type of brown rice served with 4 different types of melted cheese)
Risotto Al Funghi Porcini (Brown rice with imported porcini mushrooms cream and parmesan cheese)
Risotto Con Asparagi (Special type of brown rice served with asparagus in white wine and parmesan cheese)
Risotto Del Fattore (Brown rice speciality with tomatoes, onion, capsicum, mushroom, olives and parsely)
Risotto Della Nonna Adelina (Brown rice cooked with a creamy red-yellow capsicum paste flavoured with vodka)
Risotto Funghi E Zafferano (Brown rice with mushrooms and delicately flavoured with saffron, cream and parmesan cheese)
Siciliana (Classic sicilian tomato sauce, mozzarella, aubergine and parsley)
Spinaci Crespelle (Savoury pancake stuffed with spinach & cheese in a bechamel sauce, served with warm farmer's bread)
Tortellini De Zia Cuncetta (Home made pasta stuffed with mushrooms in a cheese sauce with zucchini, mint and garlic)
Tortellini Del Casale (Home made pasta stuffed with mushrooms in a traditional tomato sauce with garlic,cheese and sun-dried tomatoes)
Tris (Serves 1) Three different types of pasta and sauce of the chef`s choice.(Minimum order- 2 portions).
Vegetable Au Gratini (Medley of assorted vegetables baked in a herbed bchamel sauce, topped with bread crumbs and cheese and served with warm farmers bread)
Arabesca Salad (Tomato, cucumbers, cottage cheese, croutons, babycorn, lettuce, capsicum, garlic in lime and olive oil dressing)
Ceasar Salad (Tender lettuce leaves, black olives, oven roasted croutons dressed with mayonnaise and garnished with parmesan shavings)
Chef's Special Salad (Chef's special blend of salads)
Contadina Salad (Fresh tomatoes, garlic, basil, sun-dried tomatoes, onion and green beans served with extra virgin olive oil)
Corleone Salad (A mixed salad with lettuce, corn, Italian picked onions, potatoes, sun-dried tomatoes and capers in extra virgin olive oil and balsamic vinegar dressing)
Insalata Calabrese (Steamed Carrots, Potatoes, Spring Onions, Peas And Parsley, With A Creamy Mayonnaise Dressing)
Insalata Di Monti Iblei Salad (Fresh tomatoes, ricotta cheese, green beans, spring onions, basil and sun-dried tomatoes with extra virgin olive oil and balsamic vinegar dressing)
Insalata Di Zeus (Artichokes, red capsicum, black olives, iceberg lettuce, oregano, balsamic, vinegar & extra virgin olive oil)
Insalata Gennarino Salad (Lettuce, olives, garlic, roasted red-yellow capsicum, capers, tomatoes and mozzarella dressed with extra virgin olive oil, balsamic vinegar)
Insalata Mista Salad (Fresh tomatoes, cucumber, lettuce, oregano, mozzarella cheese, oilves, extra virgin olive oil and imported balsamic vinegar)
Burritos (Soft tortilla rolls with refried beans, sour cream, lettuce, shredded cabbage and cheese)
Chimi-Changa (Roasted envelope filled with red, yellow, green capsicum and cottage cheese marinated in Mexican spices)
Mexican Rice (Brown rice with refried beans, vegetables and mushrooms)
Spinaci Verdure Crespelle (Savoury pancake stuffed with spinach & vegetable cheese in abchamel sauce, served with warm farmer's bread)
Cheese Cake (Strawberry, mango, blueberry, chocolate mousse cake, banana, lemon)
Choco Nut Pancake (Landslide of chocolate truffle, scoop of chocolate mousse, mocha, chocolate ice-cream and fudge, topped with chocolate sauce)
Cream Caramel (A sweet baked custard dripping with golden caramel)
Gelato Attlantide Strawberry, fig with red wine
Gelato Del Mere Peach eine, apricot, fig with red wine
Tiramisu (A home-made Italian classic sponge cake soaked in rum and coffee with a vanilla cream custard sprinkled with chocolate powder, served cold)
data.name: Little Italy, Koramangala
